name: PolyYield
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
PolyYield Finance is the latest and greatest next generation yield farming protocol, powered by Polygon, enabling you to earn passive income. 
$YIELD is a 1:1 fork of $YELD (PolyYeld) with lowered deposit fees and a fairer initial distribution (200 tokens at launch = less price dilution with 690 tokens farmed/day).
